name: Misfortune
description:
Misfortune is a party game, for teenagers and young adults, that is more fun when played in groups of at least three people. The goal of the game is to convince the other players that your cards are better suited to the given situation than theirs, and then attempt to sabotage anyone else’s pile whose cards you think are better suited than your own.

[https://tabletopia.com/playground/misfortune-e5c4e9/play-now]
